content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The negotiation process was ongoing and we did not reach a mutual agreement on the rental price. My last offer was 866 Euro and the landlord's last offer was 867 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10 because they were respectful, fair, and patient throughout the negotiation process. They followed the rules of negotiation and maintained a professional demeanor.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
